banner.title: Indexing delay
banner.content: All marketplace data is powered by Subgraphs which index blockchain data. Due to network congestion they are sometimes behind. Although you should be still able to buy, sell, bid and all, you will see delay in the marketplace displaying those actions. Please be patient.

indexing_delay.card_content: Due to BSC indexing delay, your item might not appear here until after the subgraph caught up with latest events. Please wait patiently, everything is fine.

home_page.title: THE LIVING NFT MARKETPLACE
home_page.subtitle: Welcome to the virtual worldâ€™s one-stop-shop for the very best digital assets.

nft_page.leaving_decentraland_description: You can't publish or update {vendor} assets to the Decentraland Marketplace yet. Do you want to proceed to {vendor_link} to publish it there?
nft_page.leaving_decentraland_disclaimer: Your NFTs will still be listed in the Decentraland Marketplace

breed_price_modal.title: Enter price
breed_price_modal.line_one: You are about to add {name} to the breeding centre.
breed_price_modal.line_two: Please enter the price of how much you want to get paid.

description.lootbox_basic: Packed with the basic essentials, this Standard Lootbox contains everything a new trainer needs to keep their Kryptomon alive.
description.lootbox_medium: In the mood for a treat? From tastier foods to better toys, this Silver Lootbox gives up and coming trainers all they need to treat their Kryptomon for a job well done.
description.lootbox_premium: The ultimate level in Kryptomon care, Gold Lootboxes are for the very best trainers who understand that a happy Kryptomon is a strong one. Lavish your Kryptomon with the finest foods, state of the art medicine and watch it dominate the battlefield!
description.unfreeze_potion: Use the unfreeze potion to give your kryptomon a new life!

confirm.title: Please confirm
confirm.line_two: Please re-enter the number of items

bid.not_enough_coin_on_bid_received: The bidder doesn't have enough {coin} to pay for this bid
bid.invalid_fingerprint_on_bid_received: This asset has been modified since this bid was made and it's not valid anymore
bid.invalid_seller: You don't own this asset anymore
bid.not_enough_coin_on_bid_placed: You don't have enough {coin} to pay for this bid
bid.invalid_fingerprint_on_bid_placed: This asset has been modified since this bid was made and it's not valid anymore unless you update it

sell_page.title: List for sale
sell_page.subtitle: Set a price and expiration date for {name}.
sell_page.update_subtitle: Set a new price and expiration date for {name}.

confirm.title: Please confirm
confirm.line_one: You are about to list {name} on sale for {amount}.
confirm.line_two: Please re-enter the price to confirm:

buy_page.title: Buy {category}
buy_page.subtitle: You are about to buy {name} for {amount}.
buy_page.price_too_high: Given the current exchange rates buying this {category} will cost you over {percentageIncrease}% its normal price.
buy_page.please_wait: Please wait until prices normalize again
buy_page.actual_price: The price above is an approximation, given current exchange rates you'll end up paying around {computedPrice}
buy_page.not_enough_coin: You don't have enough {coin} to buy {name} for {amount}.

bid_page.title: Place a bid
bid_page.subtitle: Set a price and expiration date for your bid on {name}.

my_bids_page.empty_received: You haven't received any bids yet...
my_bids_page.empty_archived: You don't have any archived bids...
my_bids_page.empty_placed: You haven't placed any bids yet...

cancel_sale_page.title: Remove listing
cancel_sale_page.subtitle: You are about to remove the listing of {name} for {amount}.
cancel_sale_page.not_for_sale: There are no active listings for {name}.
cancel_sale_page.invalid_owner: You are not the owner of {name}.

settings_page.authorization_error: We couldn't load your authorizations, please try again
settings_page.authorization_error_contact: If the error persist don't hesitate to contact us
settings_page.pending_tx: Transaction pending, click the spinner to go to your activity for a detailed status

authorization.authorize: Authorize the {contract_link} contract to operate {symbol} on your behalf on {network}
authorization.allowed: You authorized the {contract_link} contract to operate {symbol} on your behalf
authorization.approved: You authorized the {contract_link} contract to operate {symbol} on your behalf
authorization.disallowed: You unauthorized the {contract_link} contract to operate {symbol} on your behalf
authorization.disapproved: You unauthorized the {contract_link} contract to operate {symbol} on your behalf

authorization_modal.title: Authorize {token}
authorization_modal.description: In order to continue you will need to authorize the {contract} contract to operate {token} tokens on your behalf.{br}This only has to be done once, and you can always manage your authorizations from the {settings_link} page.

transfer_page.title: Transfer {category}
transfer_page.subtitle: You are about to transfer {name}.
transfer_page.for_sale: {name} can't be transferred because it's on sale.
transfer_page.invalid_owner: You are not the owner of {name}.
transfer_page.warning: Remember that transferring is an irreversible operation.{br}Please check the address carefully.

clear_history_modal.title: Are you sure?
clear_history_modal.text: You are about to clear your transaction history. Do you want to proceed?

detail.approve_token: You {action} the {contract} contract to operate {token} on your behalf.
detail.cancel_order: You removed the listing of {name} for {price}.
detail.place_bid: You placed a bid of {price} on {name}.
detail.accept_bid: You accepted a bid of {price} on {name}.
detail.cancel_bid: You cancelled a bid of {price} on {name}.

coin.running_on: This is {coin} running in the {network} Network

wallet.sign_in_required: You need to {sign_in} to access this page.

price_change_notice.message: The price may fluctuate due to market changes

intro_popup.title: Introducing Polygon KMON
intro_popup.content: Polygon KMON will allow you to make transactions much cheaper and faster.{br}You can learn more about Polygon KMON in our {blog_link}, and don't forget you can start managing your coins in our new {account_link}.{br}Click your avatar, select {manage_account} and start conquering the Metaverse.

meta_transaction_failure.title: Meta transaction
meta_transaction_failure.body: There was an error sending the meta transaction.{br}Please try again or join our {discord_link} to get support.
